issue.title: [Rust] "Statistics support" in rust/parquet readme is incorrect
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8473](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8473). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Statistics are not actually supported in rust implementation of parquet. See <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/3e3712a14a3242d70145fb9d3d6f0f4b8c374e68/rust/parquet/src/column/writer.rs#L522> or similar lines in this file, or writer.rs.

https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6951

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8473?focusedCommentId=17091127) by Chao Sun (csun):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6951
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6951>
